Class RegularPolygon

java.lang.Object
  RegularPolygon

public class RegularPolygon
extends java.lang.Object

An easy method for figuring out the area and perimeter of a regular polygon.

Version:
v2.4.3.2.5.6.7.8.6.5.4.3.42.1
